TopicTitle: My very first flight in 0.17 ended... improbably...

Articles.Content:
Maybe this is easy to do if you know a couple of tricks... but given that all I did was slap a booster onto the cockpit and press spacebar twice... this seemed awfully unlikely:

Album
That's pretty tricky, assuming you didn't use the parachute of-course...
He used a parachute, you can see the hole where it deployed. Still pretty epic.

That's pretty tricky, assuming you didn't use the parachute of-course...

I used a parachute... but nothing else. WASD keys were not utilized during this flight due to cutbacks in the training program.

(I was just doing a height test to see if the SRB changed at all in 0.17.)

Pilot looks nonplussed.

Who is that champs name? Resolution too low to see.

Pilot looks nonplussed.

Who is that champs name? Resolution too low to see.

Brian McKerman

Here's a link to a higher res image.
